ARABIC: فَإِذَا قَرَأْتَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ فَٱسْتَعِذْ بِٱللَّهِ مِنَ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنِ ٱلرَّجِيمِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Whenever you recite the Qur'an, seek refuge with Allah from the accursed Shaytan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So, when you recite the Qur'an seek refuge in God from Satan the execrable.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Whenever you read the Qur'an seek refuge with Allah from Satan, the accursed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), when you recite the Quran, seek refuge in God from the mischief of satan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when you recite the Qur’an, seek the refuge of Allah from Satan the outcast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So when you recite the Qur'an, seek refuge with Allah from Shaytan, the outcast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So when you recite the Quran, seek refuge with Allah from the accursed Shaitan,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: When thou recitest the Koran, seek refuge in God from the accursed Satan;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when thou recitest the Qur'an, seek refuge in Allah from Satan the outcast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When you read the Quran, seek God's protection from Satan, the rejected one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when thou wouldst read the Qur'an seek refuge with Allah from Satan the damned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When you recite the Quran, seek the protection of Allah against the outcast Satan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When thou dost read the Qur'an, seek Allah's protection from Satan the rejected one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So when you want to recite the Quran, seek refuge with Allah from Shaitan (Satan), the outcast (the cursed one).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When you recite the Koran, seek refuge in Allah from the stoned satan:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When you read the Quran, seek refuge with God from Satan the outcast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So when you recite the Qur'an, [first] seek refuge in Allah from Satan, the expelled [from His mercy].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:98] And when you recite the Qur’ān, that is, when you intend to recite it, seek refuge in God from Satan the outcast, in other words, say a‘ūdhu bi’Lllāhi min al-shaytān al-rajīm, ‘I seek refuge in God from the accursed Satan’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when thou recitest the Qur'an) so if you want, Muhammad, to recite the Qur'an at the beginning of the prayer or at any other time, (seek refuge in Allah) say: I seek refuge in Allah (from Satan the outcast) the accursed, the one stoned with a shooting star, the debarred from Allah's mercy.
